Class Director

Object
  Thread
      Director
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Director
extends Thread

For each domain, there is a socket for it. Receives commands from the CommandParser and sends them to the appropriate domain via TCP sockets. Messages from the domains are sent back to the CommandParser.

Creates a MyComponent.

Version:
October 20, 2006
Author:
mayo

Method Detail

show

public void show()
Precondition: Universal GUI is not visible.

Postcondition: Universal GUI is visible.

hide

public void hide()
Precondition: Universal GUI is visible.

Postcondition: Universal GUI is not visible.

closeAll

public void closeAll()
Precondition: 0 or more domains are open.

Postcondition: Closes all open sockets and terminates those domains. If no domain is open, no sockets are closed.

runline

public String runline(String cmd)
Precondition: Socket is open to the intended domain.

Postcondition: Command is sent to the intended domain. Domain executes the command that is receives.

Parameters:
cmd - command from the CommandParser which is then sent to the domain that it is intended for.
Returns:
returns a string representing an utterance from a domain.

startDomain

public void startDomain(String name)
Precondition: 0 or more domains are running, and the socket of the desired domain to start is created.

Postcondition: The domain is started and its socket is opened, if it is not already running.

Parameters:
name - name of the domain to start

quitDomain

public void quitDomain(String domain)
Precondition: 1 or more domains are running, and the socket of the desired domain is open.

Postcondition: The domain is ended and associated socket is closed.

Parameters:
domain - domain name to close
